GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v6.0.17
GSD.description:
pnode: terminate at peers of source

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit e7c9f10c44a8919cd8bbd51b228c84d0caf7d518, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit f2ebb3a921c1ca1e2ddd9242e95a1989a50c4c68. For more details please see the references link.
